amendment.description: To provide adequate funding for Economic Development Administration disaster relief grants pursuant to the agreement on disaster relief funding included in the Budget Control Act of 2011.

vote.text: Amendment SA 836 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 836 proposed by Senator Lautenberg to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6752-6753; text: CR S6752) To provide adequate funding for Economic Development Administration disaster relief grants pursuant to the agreement on disaster relief funding included in the Budget Control Act of 2011.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 836 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 836 proposed by Senator Lautenberg to Amendment SA 738.
